Title: Desjardins' point
Content: The Desjardins pancreatic point or Desjardins point is the point on the surface of the abdomen above the head of the pancreas It is located approximately 57 cm off the navel on the line running from it to the right armpit It is named after the French surgeon Abel Desjardins  Painfulness during the palpation of the abdomen at this point is among the earliest known medical signs for diagnosing pancreas disorers
